name: Role of Blockchain On Personalized AI Experiences
description:
You'll learn:
- How personalized AI agents can be built based on users' digital interactions, extending LLM's use case from search to interaction
- How blockchain enables persistent AI memory and allows cross-platform personalization with privacy

We'll also cover how Zero-Knowledge cryptography elevates LLM-based applications through personal RAG and decentralized vector databases. 

The session will include a coding workshop for a hands-on understanding of the covered technologies.
